```{r setup}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

set.seed(1234)

n_hospitals   <- 8
births_per_wk <- 32
n_weeks       <- 10
start_date    <- as_date("2025-01-01")

full <- expand_grid(
  hospital_id   = 1:n_hospitals,
  week_num      = 1:n_weeks,
  birth_in_week = 1:births_per_wk
) %>%
  mutate(
    delivery_date = start_date + weeks(week_num - 1),
    period = case_when(
      week_num %in% 1:2  ~ 0,
      week_num %in% 5:6  ~ 1,
      week_num %in% 9:10 ~ 2,
      TRUE               ~ NA_real_
    )
  ) %>%
  select(-birth_in_week)

sim <- full %>% filter(!is.na(period))
N   <- nrow(sim)

p_kmc <- plogis(-1 + 0.5*(sim$period == 1) + 1.0*(sim$period == 2))
sim <- sim %>%
  mutate(
    kmc_practice = rbinom(N, 1, p_kmc),
    kmc_location = if_else(runif(N) < (0.2 + 0.1*(period == 1)),
                           "At home", "At facility"),
    kmc_bare_chest_understanding =
      if_else(runif(N) < 0.6 + 0.2*(period > 0),
              "Understanding is correct", "Understanding is incorrect"),
    kmc_minimal_clothing_understanding =
      if_else(runif(N) < 0.5 + 0.15*(period > 0),
              "Understanding is correct", "Understanding is incorrect"),
    kmc_duration = sample(
      c("1-10 minutes","11-20 minutes","21-29 minutes","30 minutes","More than 30 minutes"),
      N, replace = TRUE
    ),
    RES_signup = if_else(rbinom(N, 1, plogis(-2 + 0.7*(period == 2))) == 1,
                         "Yes", "No")
  )

sim <- sim %>%
  mutate(
    delivery_type            = sample(c("Vaginal","C-section"), N, TRUE, c(0.7,0.3)),
    baby_sex                 = sample(c("M","F"),           N, TRUE),
    mother_parity            = sample(c("Yes","No"),        N, TRUE, c(0.4,0.6)),
    mother_age               = sample(15:45,                   N, TRUE),
    mother_education         = sample(c("None","Primary","Secondary","Higher"), N, TRUE, c(0.1,0.3,0.4,0.2)),
    mother_occupation        = sample(c("Unemployed","Farmer","Laborer","Professional"), N, TRUE),
    mother_caste             = sample(c("A","B","C","D"), N, TRUE),
    household_bpl_ration_card= sample(c("Yes","No","Donâ€™t Know"), N, TRUE, c(0.5,0.3,0.2)),
    caregiver_count          = sample(1:5,                    N, TRUE)
  )

sim <- sim %>%
  mutate(
    # Vignette 1
    v1_affective_attitude        = sample(c("Calm", "Unsettled", "Not sure"), N, TRUE),
    v1_instrumental_attitude     = sample(c("Helpful", "Unhelpful", "Not sure"), N, TRUE),
    v1_descriptive_norm          = sample(c("Most would", "Few would", "Not sure"), N, TRUE),
    v1_injunctive_norm           = sample(c("Supportive", "Unsupportive", "Not sure"), N, TRUE),
    v1_behavioral_control        = sample(c("Manageable", "Too difficult", "Not sure"), N, TRUE),
    v1_self_efficacy             = sample(c("Confident", "Not confident", "Not sure"), N, TRUE),

    # Vignette 2
    v2_affective_attitude        = sample(c("Calm", "Unsettled", "Not sure"), N, TRUE),
    v2_instrumental_attitude     = sample(c("Helpful", "Unhelpful", "Not sure"), N, TRUE),
    v2_descriptive_norm          = sample(c("Most would", "Few would", "Not sure"), N, TRUE),
    v2_injunctive_norm           = sample(c("Supportive", "Disapproving", "Not sure"), N, TRUE),
    v2_behavioral_control        = sample(c("Manageable", "Too difficult", "Not sure"), N, TRUE),
    v2_self_efficacy             = sample(c("Confident", "Not confident", "Not sure"), N, TRUE)
  )


dir.create("data", showWarnings = FALSE)
write_csv(sim, "data/kmc_survey.csv")

cat("Simulation complete: ", N, " rows written to data/kmc_survey.csv\n")

head(sim)
```
